name: Pro Wrestling
storyline: Pro Wrestling it's the video match of the year. A no-holds barred battle between you and a friend, or some of the biggest bruisers this side of Madison Square Garden. Just try to pin The Iron Soldier. Or wiggle away from The Giant Bull. Or just survive the cruel Crusher Brothers. Body slam. Drop kick. Pile drive. You'll even have the notorious German Suplex Hold. All at your command. Go for the title. Mexican League, Pacific League or World League. Whatever you d(), play rough. Play to win.
summary: Pro Wrestling is a professional wrestling video game released for the Sega Master System in 1986 by Sega. It centers around tag team wrestling, with four duos that players can select and guide to various championship titles around the world.
